comment._content: Also known as the Royal Albert Bridge (1859) built by Brunel - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Albert_Bridge Take three minutes out of your busy life to go across on a train! - youtu.be/07XQ1eCdtgc

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks very much for this additional information beachcomberaustralia. We'll look into adding the other name for the bridge the next time we update the record.
